{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the drug that is not typically used in anaesthetic emergencies. Aminophylline is used for respiratory emergencies as per Document [21]. Epinephrine is used in anaphylaxis and cardiac arrest situations as per Document [23]. Atropine sulphate is used in cardiovascular emergencies as per Document [23]. Amoxycillin is an antibiotic and is not typically used in anaesthetic emergencies.", "answer_choice": "D"}
